title: Identify Inefficient Bins for Relocation
description: An operator analyzes waste collection data to find smart bins that are consistently underutilized, suggesting they could be relocated.

tasks.description: Retrieve historical fill-level data for all smart bins over the past 6 months.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully queries the waste management database.

tasks.description: Analyze the data to identify bins whose average fill level at time of collection is below 20%.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent generates a list of underutilized bins.

tasks.description: Create a report for the sanitation department recommending these bins for potential relocation to higher-traffic areas.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent provides a data-driven recommendation for asset optimization.
